name: Quantum Bot
description:
Being on the micro scale can't stop you from making changes on the macro of the universe. Traverse platform to platform to achieve your ends but be wary of the spacetime altering entities on your way! They could lead to...unintended consequences.

Made at the 2021 McGam Jam by team XORBread (aka team 4)
